greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Dominant (i.e., most populous) digit in Kolakoski sequence (A000002) when partitioned into groups of 7.
link: Nathaniel Johnston, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
maple: lim:=400: s:=[1, 2, 2]: for n from 3 to lim do for i from 1 to s[n] do s:=[op(s), 1+((n-1)mod 2)]: od: od: lim2:=floor(nops(s)/7)-1: for n from 0 to lim2 do if(add(s[7*n+k],k=1..7)<=10)then printf("1, "): else printf("2, "): fi: od: # _Nathaniel Johnston_, May 01 2011
results.author: _Jon Perry_, Sep 21 2002
